title: Luxury goods market worldwide by segment share in 2007 and 2012
summary: This statistic shows Luxury and goods market worldwide of nominees for the Luxury segment share in 2012 .
In 2 to 8 , 2012 the percentage of positve market worldwide for Mitt Fashion_/_Apparel was 41.9 % .
The analysis includes an analysis of more than 11,000 news websites around the by and the full public feed of tweets on Twitter .
gold: The statistic shows the luxury goods market worldwide in 2007 and 2012 , by segment share.
Watches and jewelry had a share of 16.2 percent in the global luxury goods market in 2007.
This segment is estimated to increase to 18.2 percent by 2012 .
